cards.title: Node
powers: Draw a card or {NodeCharacter} deals 1 target 0 psychic damage. If damage is dealt this way, {NodeCharacter} deals that target 0 psychic damage and increases the next damage dealt to that target by 1.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may discard a card to reduce the next damage dealt to a hero character card in their play area by the number of active heroes until the start of your next turn.
Reveal the top card of a deck. Put it into play or discard it.
One player discards up to 2 cards. For each card discarded in this way, one player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Stay focused, everyone. I'll be with you all the way.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: The worse things get, the more we need to stick together!
openingLines.VainFacadePlaytest.BlitzCharacter: You could have been a hero, Wade. Just let the past go.
openingLines.VainFacadePlaytest.GrandfatherCharacter: We've all wanted to change the past, but just because you [i]can[/i] doesn't mean you [i]should[/i]. This time belongs to the people in it.
openingLines.VainFacadePlaytest.TheBaronessCharacter: We've all lost something. You've been frozen in the past for long enough. Won't you let me help you?
openingLines.AmbuscadeCharacter: Your true scars can't be seen by others. Once you see that, you'll be free.
openingLines.BaronBladeCharacter: Hatred is a poison that you drink yourself. You're plotting your own doom and hoping others join you.
openingLines.ChokepointCharacter: Your mind is bent and twisted, calling out for help. Answer it, instead.
openingLines.CitizenDawnCharacter: You're not fighting us. You're fighting ghosts that have long since faded from the world.
openingLines.DeadlineCharacter: How can you see the future if you can't see past your own grief?
openingLines.HeroicInfinitorCharacter: You're not alone. We're here to help.
openingLines.IronLegacyCharacter: Your legacy is not justice, but pain.
openingLines.TheMatriarchCharacter: This is not the way! Please stop this before someone gets hurt.
openingLines.MissInformationCharacter: Who.. didn't... save... who? I'm sorry, I thought I heard another voice...
openingLines.MissInformationTeamCharacter: Don't you think one reality's burdens are more than enough to bear?
openingLines.Cauldron.GrayCharacter: If you just stop, we can help you.
openingLines.Cauldron.OutlanderCharacter: You're destroying yourself in a vain attempt to overcome the past. You've become the evil you fought against.

cards.title: Bleeding Edge
body: You may play a card.
Return any number of Connections in play to your hand.
For each Connection returned this way, you may draw a card, then you may play a card.
Increase the next damage dealt to {NodeCharacter} by X, where X = the number of hero cards played since this card entered play.
cards.flavorText: <Node! I know you can hear me!{BR}Stop this! It's killing you!>
cards.flavorReference: [y=0.75]Push, Bastion City: A Spider Never Blinks #116

cards.title: Clever Hack
body: Destroy 1 Equipment or environment card or {NodeCharacter} deals 1 Device 6 irreducible lightning damage.

flavorQuotes.text: It doesn't matter how{BR}strong your powers are, Emma.{BR}Computer skills will always matter.

cards.title: Collective Unconscious
body: Play this card in another hero's play area. Cards in this play area and {NodeCharacter}'s are [i]Connected.[/i]
When {NodeCharacter} or that hero uses a power, the other gains 1 HP.
When {NodeCharacter} would deal that hero psychic damage, that hero recovers that much HP instead.

flavorQuotes.text: Nice to hear your eerie,{BR}disembodied voice again.

cards.title: Dialing In
powers: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until 2 Connections are revealed. Put 1 into your hand. Shuffle the rest into your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: I see what she means.{BR}You're doing great, Gol.{BR}There. What do you see?
I'm... so sorry... about your wife.

cards.title: Fault Detection
body: {NodeCharacter} deals up to 3 [i]Connected[/i] targets 1 psychic damage and 1 psychic damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: Minds are systems, and all{BR}systems have weak points...

cards.title: Healthy Connections
body: The first time each turn any [i]Connected[/i] hero target gains HP, another [i]Connected[/i] hero target gains 1 HP.
cards.flavorText: <The serum may be killing you, but{BR}you're not going to die today.>
cards.flavorReference: [y=0.75]Node, Bastion City: A Spider Never Blinks #114

cards.title: Hyperlinked Neurons
body: Increase damage dealt by {NodeCharacter} to [i]Connected[/i] targets other than {NodeCharacter} by 1.
powers: {NodeCharacter} deals 1 target 0 psychic damage. Select a [i]Connected[/i] hero. Increase the next damage dealt by that hero by 2.
cards.flavorText: <I know I can't make you care{BR}about the pain you cause, but I{BR}can show you how it feels.>

cards.title: Mental Feedback
body: Destroy 1 [i]Connected[/i] Ongoing. {NodeCharacter} deals the character from that deck with the highest HP 0 psychic damage and 0 psychic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: I appreciate your help, but stay{BR}out of my head.

cards.title: Network Access
body: You may shuffle your trash into your deck.
Reveal cards from the top of your deck until 2 Connections are revealed. Put 1 into your hand and 1 into play. Shuffle the other cards into your deck.
You may draw a card.
You may play a card.
cards.flavorText: <I'm in your mind. You can't outrun{BR}yourself -- or your past --{BR}but you don't have to.>

cards.title: Open Line
body: Play this card in another hero's play area. Cards in this play area and {NodeCharacter}'s are [i]Connected.[/i]
When you or that play area's owner would draw or play a card, the other may do so instead.
cards.flavorText: <I'm not a hallucination,{BR}Officer. Turn here. She doesn't{BR}have much time.>

cards.title: Packet Sniffing
body: Play this card in a non-environment play area other than {NodeCharacter}'s.
Cards in this play area and {NodeCharacter}'s are [i]Connected.[/i]
The first time each turn a card enters play in this area, you may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: I can see him{BR}standing by an old clock...{BR}His heart is heavy. He regrets what's{BR}about to happen...

cards.title: Psychic Link
body: Play this card in a non-environment play area other than {NodeCharacter}'s. Cards in this play area and {NodeCharacter}'s are [i]Connected.[/i] Play with the top card of that play area's deck face up.
The first time each turn any target in this play area would deal damage to {NodeCharacter}, increase that damage by 1.
[b]Power:[/b] Return this card to your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: I can't see who he is... but I{BR}can see what he'll do next.

cards.title: Psychological Fortitude
body: When a [i]Connected[/i] hero Ongoing or Equipment would be destroyed by a card other than itself or this card, you may destroy another [i]Connected[/i] hero Equipment or Ongoing.
When a card is destroyed by this effect, the first card is indestructible this turn.

flavorQuotes.text: <I know you don't know me,{BR}and you have no reason to trust{BR}me, but I've got you.>

cards.flavorText: <I know you don't know me,{BR}and you have no reason to trust{BR}me, but I've got you.>

cards.title: Resource Allocation
body: When a [i]Connected[/i] hero target would deal damage, you may select another [i]Connected[/i] hero target. Increase the damage dealt by the first target by 1. Reduce the next damage dealt by the second target by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Not so tough{BR}now that you're all{BR}alone, little sidekick.

cards.title: Reverse Psychology
body: Put a non-character [i]Connected[/i] card in play on top of its deck.
{NodeCharacter} deals the character from that deck with the highest HP 0 psychic and 0 psychic damage, then deals herself 2 psychic damage.

cards.title: Telepathic Extrapolation
body: When {NodeCharacter} would deal 0 or more damage to a target, you may select a keyword.
If you do, reveal and replace the top card of that deck.
If the revealed card shares the selected keyword, increase that damage by 2. Otherwise, reduce that damage by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: I was just in the{BR}neighborhood, that's all.
It's a bit weird! When everything goes{BR}wrong, you always show up with exactly{BR}what I need!

cards.title: The I in Team
body: At the start of your turn, {NodeCharacter} may deal herself 3 irreducible psychic damage. If she takes no damage this way, destroy this card.
When a [i]Connected[/i] hero target would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to another [i]Connected[/i] hero target. Reduce damage redirected this way by 1.
cards.flavorText: {BR}“Your machinations are unveiled{BR}before us, your every artifice laid bare.{BR}We see the depths of your iniquities and do{BR}not tremble. You cannot stand against us.”{BR}-Node et al., Bastion City:{BR}     A Spider Never Blinks #116
